addCommandDescription: add a visualforce page or pages to profile
deleteCommandDescription: remove a visualforce page or pages from profile
editCommandDescription: edit a visualforce page in profile
renameFlagDescription: name of page to rename to
profileNameFlagDescription: profile list to add visualforce page
filePathDescription: file path to location of profiles (force-app/main/default/profiles is the default)
usernameDescription: username or alias to use for deployment
